name: Bad Tank Game
description:
Bad Tank Game made in about 6 days.
It's basically my remake of Tank Trouble 2, make sure to check out that game also.

CONTROLS:
Green Tank:
- Movement: Arrow keys
- Shoot: Spacebar

Yellow Tank:
- Movement: WASD
- Shoot: Q

Check out my Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgKy3EdqMw1DJtoomIYW3kw
